TopicTitle: Not all settings are localized in English

Articles.Content: Many items towards the bottom of the settings windows are still displaying the name of the code behind property (camel cased) instead of the localized display string. Even English language doesn't have strings for several items.
An example I experienced is the help text when you put punctuation in the new campaign name. This popped up a message saying it needed localising.

Not being localized to other languages this early makes sense, especially if a lot of strings are going to be changing. But having debug values in the menu's or not falling back to English localization when set to a culture that is missing it's localized value is pretty unacceptable for any product placed in an end user's hands.
